channel.title: Please i have a big problem with richscape base!
channel.description: i downloaded richscape but it says i need 60attack for wearing greendhide chaps 30att and 30def for addy arrows and ect... all the item levels are crap how do i change it?

item.title: Please i have a big problem with richscape base!
item.dc:creator: @Sivan Sivan
item.description:
@Sivan wrote:

It doesn’t work well atleast you reply and try
^^^
there is no such thing in my client,java and my client.java is 281kbs lol.
its rich

Read full topic
item.source: Please i have a big problem with richscape base!

item.title: Please i have a big problem with richscape base!
item.dc:creator: @Thornton136 Thornton136
item.description:
@Thornton136 wrote:

go into client.java and search for

} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon")) { return 60;

and just change the “60” to what ever level you want the equipping level to be!!

Oh and scroll down a bit and change a few others if you want!!

I hope I helped

Read full topic
